Title: As a new user, I want to register with my email and password so that I can access personalized features.
Description: A registration form should validate inputs, send confirmation email, store encrypted password, and redirect to dashboard.

Title: As a returning user, I want to log in securely to my account.
Description: Implement login form with validation, JWT token generation, remember-me option, and error handling for failed attempts.

Title: As a shopper, I want to browse products by category so that I can find what I need quickly.
Description: Display categorized product grid with images, names, prices, and ratings. Include navigation sidebar.

Title: As a shopper, I want to search for products using keywords.
Description: Implement full-text search bar with autocomplete and results page showing matching products.

Title: As a user, I want to add products to my cart from the product listing or detail page.
Description: Clicking 'Add to Cart' increases cart count, shows toast message, and persists item in session/local storage.

Title: As a user, I want to view and modify items in my cart before checkout.
Description: Show cart summary with thumbnails, titles, prices, quantity selectors, and subtotal. Allow removal of items.

Title: As a buyer, I want to complete my purchase using a credit card via Stripe.
Description: Redirect to Stripe Checkout or embed Stripe Elements. Capture payment, confirm success/failure, and create order record.

Title: As a user, I want to see my order history after logging in.
Description: Fetch and display list of previous orders with dates, totals, statuses, and links to view details.

Title: As an admin, I want to add a new product to the catalog.
Description: Form with fields: name, description, price, category, image upload, stock quantity. Save to database and make visible on site.

Title: As an admin, I want to edit or delete existing products.
Description: Provide table/list of products with Edit/Delete buttons. Confirm deletion and update visibility instantly.
